title: Learn how to create and leverage AI art with this $30 training bundle
content:
Macworld

AI is a powerful tool to build custom images for your work, whether you’re adding custom images to your project or using it to help you generate your own art. If you’re a beginner or want to learn to utilize AI more effectively to create art, this $30 bundle can help.

Built around common AI art tools like Midjourney, the bundle opens with a “Midjourney for Beginners,” a course that teaches you the fundamentals of AI art generation, followed by a course on Midjourney and effective text prompt tactics. Round out your training with a 3-in-1 course on ChatGPT, Midjourney, and DALL-E before moving to more advanced courses. 

If you’re already a little familiar with AI and art, master classes on Midjourney and Stable Diffusion can help you push your skills to new levels. The bundle wraps up with two professional courses, the first on becoming a Midjourney expert and the second on using AI art to develop passive income streams by making and selling AI art for targeted audiences. 

Learn how to create unique AI art and leverage it with the Complete Generative AI Art and Design Mastery Bundle, now just $29.99 for a limited time.
